website_summaries.verdict: Kids enjoy playing with water and sand while developing hand-eye coordination and having fun.
pros: Holds up to 50 pounds of sand in addition to water
Has a cover to protect it from the elements
cons: Table becomes very heavy when filled with sand and water

customer_reviews.title: ... sand/water or just a water table and I’m VERY glad I chose this one
customer_reviews.text: It took me two weeks to decide between sand/water or just a water table and I’m VERY glad I chose this one! BUT let me be clear, if you have any kind of OCD and a small toddler think twice about this one. The sand and the water mix very easy and of course the toddler doesn’t care how clean you’d like the toy to stay.! One a good note, it looks to clean out very easy. Unboxing was easy and it was assembled in less than 20 minutes: the water plug was slightly difficult but no leaks!! My 1.5 year old has played with it almost all day now. Well worth the price and actually pretty therapeutic for me:)
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Sensory table
customer_reviews.text: What a GREAT water play table! Well made and the cover to divide the sand from water or another substance is a great addition. The two small figure that come along with the toy are also cute additions and by far Im this is the best sensory table I have seen verses others who have them.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Water Table
customer_reviews.text: This is the best water table ever! I looked into every single one on Amazon, and this had the best features--2 slides, diving board, bucket, funnel and more! Plus, the colors are really nice and the price point was better than a lot of the sub-par models. We've been using it for about a week and it seems pretty sturdy. Our daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Katrena

customer_reviews.title: Fun for ALL ages!
customer_reviews.text: Best Christmas gift hands down. My 2 year old could play all day with this...but my nieces (7 and 5) enjoyed playing with it too! Perfect height and lots of things to tinker with. Very easy to remove water since there is a plug on one side. Great outdoor toy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! It got the 7 year old off the IPad playing with his 2 year old brother for hours!!
customer_reviews.author: MDENF

customer_reviews.title: Better than just a water table
customer_reviews.text: I love this water sand table because it has both! My daughter plays with it all the time she is two and loves it! Just enough on both sides to keep her entertained. The sand and water can get mixed but that is something obvious you need to be aware of in advance. The only issue I had was the water plug broke when I was setting it up so little tiles replaced it free immediately: very happy
customer_reviews.author: ali Cali

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price of 39.96.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid (39.69), this is definitely a great buy. It’s not too big for our small back porch, easy to assemble, and serves its purpose. My 5 year old definitely enjoys playing with it. I’ve filled it with sand and it held up well. It now holds orbeez and the lid has been doing a great job protecting them. Def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality.
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a birthday present for our one year old and he absolutely loves it. Our older child still loves it too and plays with it. I originally only got this one becasue it was the only one that would ship in time. For the price though it is great quality and all of the additions to it are fun. The sand and water seperation are great but the cover for the sand does not keep water out from rain or our sprinklers. @hymn.life
customer_reviews.author: Hymn.Life

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but fun for my little one.
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard finding fun sand and water tables that do a lot in terms of activity. This one is kind of boring to me, but my daughter seems to like it. My friend in Australia found one that does way more Than this for half the price, but oh well. I like the plug in the bottom of the water part, makes it very easy to keep water out when you’re not using it. The legs will buckle and fall out if you try to move it with both sand and water in it. All in all, it’s a fun table, even if it’s pricey. I saw it went up from $50 to $70 after I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Sand table w/ cover!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size sand and water table for 3 yo. Love that there’s a cover for the sand part. Water table has a drain plug. We place our next to the baby pool so The little people that come with the table can jump in the pool too! HOme D and other similar stores sell play sand for around $5 a bag. One 50lb bag is more than enough to fill this table for fun and not too much spillage! We use half a bag at a time and it perfect for us. Photo shows half of a 50lb bag in use.
customer_reviews.author: doonabug

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last very long
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute table, and my son loved playing with the little figures on the slide, but the legs gave out after a few months. It was filled normally (sand on one side, water on the other), nothing heavy on it or any other reason why it should collapse, but 2 of the legs just buckled.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Burger

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: My little boy loves this thing!! He is 18mths old and already as soon as he goes outside he runs straight to it, takes the cover off and starts playing.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice water table.
customer_reviews.text: Nice water table. Wish there was a cover for the water side as that is all we are using right now, and would help keep it clean/keep mosquitoes away. Some pieces come off too easily, could be some more things to do.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase & lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: I like this water table a lot. I was looking for something for my 2 & 3 year old to use outside on the back deck. We don’t really use sand, we just use both sides with water. Which is great on hot days, it helps them cool off. The toys that it comes with are cute and the boys like using the scoopers to dump the water down the slide and the other spots for it. It keeps them occupied for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: SierraB

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several water tables over the years, and this one is by far the worst I've ever purchased. Total waste of money. The legs, and all the snap on accessories don't stay put. I'm constantly having to snap the legs, and waterfall pieces back on. Poorly made, save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Keli A Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Th instructions are poorly written and illustrated. The plastic pieces do not stay together. The spots for the screws are so deep that you can't get a screw driver that's small enough for the screw to reach them. You can't tell if it's tightening or not. The plastic parts fall apart too easily. All my toddler has to do is gently touch it and it crumbles. Not worth the time or money. We mainly just bought it because of the tray style table. You can buy cheaper tray tables
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoy it despite the so-so quality
customer_reviews.text: The legs fold in if you try to move the unit with sand in it, and with water and kids you are going to end up having to move this unit around at some point. The two little white slides have lousy clips to hold it in place. I’ll be surprised if it can hold out the summer season. Kids appear to enjoy it despite my remarks .
customer_reviews.author: NYC Mechi

customer_reviews.title: What a mess!
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be great for my 2 and 4 yr old to play outside in on warm days but they don’t grasp the concept of water stays on one side and sand on the other. They have both missed together and a good amt on the patio. Have to wait til sand dries to clean up. Wish I would have bought something else to play outside with just water.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Guilliams

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I love that it has a lid, doesn’t have many toys but was simple to put together and my son loves is!
customer_reviews.author: Laura acampora

customer_reviews.title: Two year old grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It was a happy birthday! This takes a bit longer to assemble than I expected, but it was not too burdensome. The grandkids play with it all the time in the backyard. We put those trendy "water balls" (that expand in water) in it and the grandkids have a great time.
customer_reviews.author: I Love Gadgets!

customer_reviews.title: Came with sharpie drawing on it
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Has kept my son super busy. Unfortunately, we opened this on the 4th of July (the day we needed it) and while my partner was assembling it together he noticed sharpie drawing on the outside and inside of the table :( I would have loved to of send it back, but it was needed that day.
customer_reviews.author: Rugrats on Oils

customer_reviews.title: Great water and sand table
customer_reviews.text: This is the best outdoor toy. I got it for my son for his birthday, he seriously wants to play with it for hours everyday, and so do all the neighbor kids. It's a good quality water table and I love that it also has space for sand, with the cover to keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kjersten

customer_reviews.title: Some parts won't install but still very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my nephew and he absolutely loves it. As the title says, some parts are very faulty and won't install. Still would recommend as a gift as kids love this type of thing. Stay dry and bring extra clothes!
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Love it very sturdy. Hours of fun for my 5 year old grandson. I bag of large sand is all it needs. Water on other side.
customer_reviews.author: Love Lady Di

customer_reviews.title: 2 Legs Missing = Unusable!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute disappointment with this product. We bought it as a birthday present for our 1 year old daughter and when we opened it up we discovered it only came with 2 legs!!! When you pay $50 for a product that is brand new it is reasonable to expect the product to be complete...especially when it comes in a sealed box. Now, our daughter does not have a birthday gift that is usable on her birthday. Do not recommend. Little Tykes/Amazon: Please ship 2 more legs overnight!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... old likes it but the legs are not real sturdy and it is horrible to clean the water side ...
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old likes it but the legs are not real sturdy and it is horrible to clean the water side when the water gets dirty. A lot of little grooves that the sand sticks in. He loves it and it was a fair price so all is good.
customer_reviews.author: S. Faye

customer_reviews.title: Crap product. Leaks. Plug doesn’t do anything.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter can’t even enjoy this product because the water just leaks as soon as she you fill it. The “plug” is complete crap. If I had opened it before the return date it would be on the way back. Don’t buy this if you want an actual water table... it leaks all of the water out... instantly
customer_reviews.author: jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great as long as u dont lean on it
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it! Hours of fun the only complaint is my 3 yr old leaned on it while playing and one of the legs gave out and bent resulting in the table falling on her covering her with a sand and watery mess and now I cant get it to stand back up correctly.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: My 18 month old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: She plays with this water table all the time when we are outside! She hates sand so we just fill the whole thing with water and dump it when she’s done. Worth the money! Oh and very easy to set up! Did it by myself in like 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This was my grandsons go to toy over the summer. The ability to engage in sand & water play is great for the little ones. Great quality, easy to clean, cute accessories.
customer_reviews.author: awri

customer_reviews.title: Bad design water plug impossible to install and missing top of tower.
customer_reviews.text: Water plug impossIble to install, stay away bogus design tried for an hour with no luck. Also missing top of tower piece, so I can’t install the water plug and missing a piece; stay away will never purchase another product from little tikes again. Over priced for a bad design and bad quality control missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore A Polito

customer_reviews.title: A great summer toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month old granddaughter absolutely loves her new sand and water table. I purchased a cover for it since it stays outside- I don’t want it to fade in the summer sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to assemble, it provides fun for the kids, but the tab trow the toys to the slide is a little bit hard to operate. Still fun for the kids
customer_reviews.author: M. Sada

customer_reviews.title: It makes for hours of fun in the sun for her
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old daughters 3rd birthday. She absolutely loves this water table. It makes for hours of fun in the sun for her. Not a bad price for the entertainment that I get from it and the quality is great. I also love that the colors are are unisex making it easy for me to pass along to her baby brother later.
customer_reviews.author: Southernmama

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I love this sand/water table combo! My 16 month old tried it out yesterday for the first time (just with sand because it's still cold out) and she loved it. It kept her entertained for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Alesha G.

customer_reviews.title: Drain leaks. Doesn’t hold any water.
customer_reviews.text: The plug leaks. Won’t hold any water. Piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Our three year old granddaughter loves to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Our three year old granddaughter loves to play with this, but so do her playmates that range from 18 mos. to seven years old. Has held up well and was simple to assemble. We use water in one side and water beads in the other. Great fun!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie W.

customer_reviews.title: Chincy
customer_reviews.text: the leg broke off after a week of play. It wasn't even filled to the top with sand on one side and water on the other. Plus all of the attached pieces fall off constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: the hit of my grandsons party
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, perfect for my grandson who was turning 1 and even the older kids (up to age 5) had fun playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. There is plenty to keep them occupied, but not too much to keep track of :) would definitely recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun guaranteed
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase. Mi children age: 3.5 and 1 loved it. Hours of fun. Easy to ensamble. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Love the table, but came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Love this water table. Very disappointed it arrived smashed and cracked after waiting 6 weeks. I did take the steps to email vendor about a refund and saw they charge a 20% restocking fee. They could not answer my question on if I return it that I’d get 100% money back. They said they will “evaluate it”. So I love the water table, but need to return it as I would like it to last without damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase !
customer_reviews.text: Defiantly worth the money . My little girl of course mixes sand and water , but it can be easily cleaned . She weights 22 lbs and table doesn’t seems to have problem support her sand and water . Keeps he preoccupied , haven’t noticed if it leaks .
customer_reviews.author: Dinara

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: the kid loves it the only problem i have is that its hard on the old back with sand in it when you have to move it to mow the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it, takes a bit to assemble for a kids toy but not bad
customer_reviews.author: CompsDoc

customer_reviews.title: great value easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size play table! My 2 yr old is busy for hours! Love the little toys that came with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Little tikes water playset
customer_reviews.text: My nieces loveds this outdoor sand/water playset. Great product. All the pieces were there and brand new! Got an awesome deal so I was very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: The item itself is great. There was no outer box so I suggest ...
customer_reviews.text: The item itself is great. There was no outer box so I suggest not giving it as a gift as the box does come destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Hiiroxanne

customer_reviews.title: 19 month old LOVES this!
customer_reviews.text: My 19mo old loves this table! I (his mother) loves playing in the sand too. Easy to assemble, perfect height, easy to drain and clean. Fun!
customer_reviews.author: robin a

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height for the 2yo and 4yo, they love it! Easy to put together and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Virgie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble, entertaining
customer_reviews.text: It is a great size for a tight space. It has enough toys (slides, buckets, rake, etc.) to keep kids amused.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy - and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this has a lever that flips the Little People down the slides and into the water. Our 23-month-old grandson loves to hit the lever over and over. Very sturdy and the colors are great.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fila

customer_reviews.title: great for grandkid
customer_reviews.text: sturdy, water and sand tight, great little toy for a 2-3 year old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height for a toddler.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this. Great size. Quite sturdy. Easy to put together EXCEPT for the plug. You’ll need pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but a little fragile.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great concept and design but I have doubts it will last very long. My granddaughter loves it and plays with it daily but everything is pretty thin plastic and not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 2yo daughter loves this. She plays with it everyday. When its not outdoors in inside with mega blocks on the sand pit side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up and very sturdy, the children love it.
customer_reviews.author: veronica hiscock

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Put together in a snap & quickly, was up to inventive two year old climbing onto it, and captivated his attention. Was told he loved the sand & water all summer! Really great for pretending & play.
customer_reviews.author: Kim A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and simple
customer_reviews.text: Got the table for xmas gift and siding take much to put together. make sure to have a long screw driver to use when putting it together. but i gave a low review because it didnt have the fisher price logo. i didn’t see it in the box and it didnt come on the table.
customer_reviews.author: DeAndra Young

customer_reviews.title: Great for hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great for hours of fun! Easy to assemble, and as long as the plug is inserted correctly, we haven’t had any issues with it leaking. It’s a great buy for more backyard fun!
customer_reviews.author: LesleyJ

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all littles
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, my 15 month old loves this toy. It was great for her especially when she was standing and not yet walking, and is still fun for even our friend’s 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Manns

customer_reviews.title: Interesting and Fun for Toddlers and Preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves this table and looks forward to playing with it whenever he visits.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome water table!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this water table for my 3 year old son and he loves it! The first night we had it we had friends over and him and all the kids loved playing in it! The slides are so cute for the little people to go down and I feel like it kept him occupied for almost 2 hours! Great colors and easy to put together also!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Great play place. Easy to clean and lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions
customer_reviews.text: My grandbaby loves this, but it wasn't that easy to assemble. You HAVE to follow the steps by step instructions, which could have been written a little better, or you will have to back track.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: this provides hours of fun for 1 year old and 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Kids do not always keep water in the water section. Once water gets dumped into the sand section, it's very hard to get it out since there is no drain on that side. Have to manually scoop out the water. Otherwise, this provides hours of fun for 1 year old and 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: ycheng

customer_reviews.title: Great for your babies
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Easy to use instructions. My daughters absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: Detroit Gator

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old grandson loves playing with the water side especially. Seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Kids ages 1-8 love it! Plenty to do besides just playing with water! Great water table.
customer_reviews.author: 1Amazon user_334

customer_reviews.title: big and small all love to play with this
customer_reviews.text: All the kids in the neighborhood, big and small all love to play with this. I didn't put sand in because it was for my 1 year granddaughter but both sides hold water just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Set up, filled with water, water leaked out instantly. Drain plug was poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Quality concerns
customer_reviews.text: This water table is incredibly cute. I love the two separate sides and that it has a cover for the sand. However, when putting it together, the legs are not clicking correctly into place and the screws won't tighten on the tower. I like the idea and look of this toy, but the quality could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Torres

customer_reviews.title: Keeps them busy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (2) LOVES this! I didn't fill it with sand because my husband thinks it will fill with fleas or become a giant liter box for the strays lol. So instead my daughter likes to sit in that part (which I watch her very carefully to make sure she doesn't fall) and play. Set up was easy with the exception of the plug. I do not know why the plug doesn't come pre-installed! It keeps her attention and has been great on these hot days that I do not feel like pulling out the pool. I can place this in the shade and she can splash and stay cool.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I run a childcare and the kids love this table. I use it as a water table only.
customer_reviews.author: 3boyz2dog mom

customer_reviews.title: My little loves its
customer_reviews.text: The plug was hard to get in there and the screws were hard to find but besides that it's a great water and sand table.
customer_reviews.author: sean kell

customer_reviews.title: Best combo for sand and water play
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait until my 3 year old granddaughter gets here in a week to play with this! She will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nanmac52

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Very pleased with this product. My grandson has really enjoyed it
customer_reviews.author: Linda Edgington

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a toddler. Many hours of entertainment in one area!
customer_reviews.author: Shandoc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 19 month old twin nephews absolutely loved this.It's one of their favorite toys for outside play.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got it at a great price! Good toy to occupy my 3 year old grandson!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ladut

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit for my daughter's first birthday present and all the kids at her party loved playing with it.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: not real sturdy but fine for a 3 or 4 year old. nice little set up.
customer_reviews.author: DSP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and my 2 year old loves it so far
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: MY grandstands LOVED this water table. Hours and Hours of great fun
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Buchman

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter and she has hours of fun playing with it and also in it. She climbed in and was trying to bath herself. She puts her dolls in there and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Delilah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a toddler.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and lots of fun for a little one.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a touch taller, but my daughter loves it. Just let her go and kept her busy for hours. Would recommend for any child especially those who like to be outside.
customer_reviews.author: rachael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect birthday present
customer_reviews.text: My son loves playing with this! Easy to clean and keep covered from all the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: Fun water/sand table
customer_reviews.text: My child loves playing in her table on the porch. We are able to put water, sand, rice, marbles, etc. in the table and it's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and hours of water play
customer_reviews.text: Great for a 5 year old and adults to play too! So easy to use, convenient and fun
customer_reviews.author: Jen Waiten

customer_reviews.title: Pieces Were Missing
customer_reviews.text: The product was a gift for a 2 year old. While putting the table together in front of the child, it was discovered that pieces were missing, important pieces, the legs. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as listed
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money and definitely provides hours of play for a toddler. Came as pictured and was easy to assemble. Very quick delivery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a pain to put together, but cute once you do.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Keith

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: It is very cute but is not sturdy. I came out one morning after having it less than a week and the legs buckled underneath it. Now it constantly has to be picked up and put back together.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Decent for price, could be built a little more sturdy. 3 of the legs wouldn't lock in to place so when attempting to move it they often pop out and make the process a bit more titius than it needs to be
customer_reviews.author: Gina Astacio

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift for my grandson turning ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my grandson turning two. He hardly paid attention to his other gift and played with this table for the entire party. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Product purchased for 3 year old. Wish it had more activity components. He got bored after a few times.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy enough for toddlers. Provides hours of fun with the sand and water.

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! A pain to put together. 2 year old loves it!

customer_reviews.title: 16 month old has fun with it
customer_reviews.text: He loves it. 16 month old. He just plays with the sand side now.
customer_reviews.author: lady rae

product_meta.title: Little Tikes Sandy Lagoon Sand & Water Table – Amazon Exclusive
product_meta.description: Newer version of the best selling Little Tikes Sandy Lagoon Waterpark! Your kids will want to take a trip to the Sandy Lagoon Waterpark… and it's only a trip to the backyard! With so many features and both sand and water areas, kids will have hours of fun. Race characters down waterslides, launch them off diving boards, and soak them with silly dump buckets. And, for parents, the built-in drain plug and a protective cover for the sand area make clean up easy. That's sunny smiles for everyone!
feature_bullets: Engaging and colorful sand and water play table allows for character play and is elevated for standing toddlers
Put characters in floating inner tubes or have them race down twin water slides
Play with 2-in-1 shovel/rake on the sand beach
Built-in drain plug for easy clean up
Includes 2 characters, 2 inner tubes, 1 shovel, 1 cup, and 1 custom-fit plastic cover

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars574 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
